name: PythonPunk
tagline: PythonPunk the war of all time
body:
PythonPunk is a text-based RP pick your story game currently being developed by Nathan Stevens(A.K.A TheTechPunk) and Matthew Royster(A.K.A MattRoyster) For more info on development follow @The_TechPunk and check the GitHub Repository INFO -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- In a world of War there is a need, a need for a Hero. Be that hero in PythonPunk be the Captain and save the worlds of the United Planets! Several different paths for you to take resulting in a different Story every time! Intro in C0DE: `print("In a world before our own") time.sleep(3) print("There was a devastating war") time.sleep(3) print("A rebellion continued to fight for the fallen army") time.sleep(3) print("But in order to prevent the army from falling") time.sleep(3) print("They needed him...a hero...the leader of the rebels")` TERMS OF USE -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- You may *) Enjoy this game! *) Edit for enjoyment You may **NOT** *) Use game or code for anything outside of personal enjoyment *) Use for profit *) Edit and claim as own or claim in general
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License.
